long_description: Offering smashing good looks during yoga and any light fitness activity, the women's MPG Prelude Leggings feature moisture-wicking fabric and a flattering fit. 4-way stretch fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly to keep you comfortable during exercise. The women's MPG Prelude Leggings offer a next-to-skin fit with a low rise. Mesh insert at waist; satin elastic drawcord; reflective logo.
short_description: Offering smashing good looks during yoga and any light fitness activity, the women's MPG Prelude Leggings feature moisture-wicking fabric and a flattering fit.
